Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>……おまえの拳は…… なかなかこたえた……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, your fists... They helped me find an answer to my problems.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだろう、そうだろう。 男には拳でわかり合う瞬間が必要だよな。
Entry.EnglishText: Of course they did. There comes a time in every man's life where he needs to come to an understanding with his fists.

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクはそんなイタイ瞬間はいらないな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I don't need to go through such a hard time.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>は、男としてはまだまだ半人前だな。 いつかわかる日が来るって。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, you're still halfway to being a man. One day, you'll come to understand.

Entry.JapaneseText: お姉さん離れできない<Tytree>に 言われたくないよね、ね、<Veigue>？
Entry.EnglishText: I don't need some guy who can't let go of his sister to tell me such a thing. Right, <Veigue>?
